name: SoftSmithy
body:
This is the home of the Open Source projects maintained by SoftSmithy.

### The SoftSmithy Utility Library
The [SoftSmithy Utility Library](softsmithy-lib/lib/0.5/docs) is the core of this projects. It provides many different general utility classes and frameworks. 

### The SoftSmithy Development Utility Library
The [SoftSmithy Development Utility Library](softsmithy-lib/devlib/0.5/docs) provides utility classes and frameworks, which are useful at development time.

### Visually Evoked Potentials
[Visually Evoked Potentials](vep)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
